page.title: 15WEATHER
page.content: {SPRING}:A strong wind is usually present.There are lots of rain showers.There is often a mist hanging over the coast line and the surrounding houses.The sun appears occasionally{.SUMMER}:The weather changes considerably.It is extremely hot and sunny.Temperatures usually exceed 20C. but the average is 16C.It is very humid inland,but there are lots of sea breezes{.AUTUMN:}the weather is fairly moderate but rain showers are frequent.The temperature decreases quite rapidly after October.The wind begins to get stronger.There are sometimes hail showers.{WINTER:}The weather is very much colder.There is frost and very strong winds. Occasionally there is snow.Usually the winter is fairly mild.Temperatures are usually around 6C.The annual rainfall is 970 mm.
